title: Apply Today ~ Move In Tomorrow!
map_address: 22250 Swan St near 9 Mile Rd & Pontiac Trail
posting_body: ['Brookdale Apartments is located in Downtown South Lyon which is known for its historic charm, top-notch parks and excellent schools.', 'Our community offers spacious and charming one and two bedroom apartment homes.', 'Residents at Brookdale Apartments value our complimentary concierge services, dedicated maintenance team, and first-class amenities.', 'We value our residents and take pride in our community!', 'Come home to Brookdale Apartments.', 'We’re waiting for you!', "Carport FREE with every apartment home, Large private balconies, Full kitchen, dishwasher and garbage disposal, Laundry center located inside each building (2nd floor)Ceiling fan in dining room, Central air/heat, Blinds throughout apartment home, AT&T U-Verse available, Pets welcomed of all sizes (breed restrictions), 24-hour fitness center, Refreshing outdoor swimming pool, Picnic area with grills, Resident garden plots, Concierge services, Downtown Ann Arbor is only a 17-mile drive via a quick and easy access to US 23Local colleges Washtenaw Community, Cleary College and University of Michigan, Nearby banks Comerica, Citizens, Chase, Bank of America, Charter One and many more, Busch's, Kroger's less than a mile, Twelve Oaks Mall Novi is less than 20 mins.", 'Come stay with us...', 'We welcome you!', 'Our one bedroom apartment homes offer a wide variety of comforts.', 'They boast 700 square feet of beautiful living space, a walkthrough kitchen with plenty of counter space, lots of storage space, central A/C and gas heating, and even a FREE carport!', '2nd and 3rd floor apartments even come with your very own private balcony!', 'Come to Brookdale and see all that we have to offer!', 'Amenities:', '- Parking - Carport Included', '- Pool - With Large Sundeck', '- Exercise Facility - 24 Hours', '- Other amenities - Concierge Services - WIFI Access in Clubhouse - Community Garden', 'Appliances:', '- Air Conditioning', '- Dishwasher', '- Garbage Disposal', '- Range - Electric', '- Refrigerator', '- Oven - Electric', '- Other appliances - Laundry Facilities in every building', 'Lease Lengths:', '- 12 Months lease', '- Other lease lengths - We offer anywhere from 2-month leasing, all the way through 15-months!', 'Pets:', '- Cats Allowed', '- Small Dogs Allowed - Breed restrictions apply', '- Other pet policies - $100 Non-Refundable Pet Fee (per pet).', ' Monthly Pet Fee $30 Per Month Per Pet - Up to 2 pets', 'Utilities:', '- Trash Pick-up', 'Included', '- Resident Pays Electricity - DTE', '- Resident Pays Gas - Consumers Energy', '- Resident Pays Water', '- High-Speed Internet Available', '- Other utilities - Trash Pick Up Included', 'Contact Brookdale Apartments at', 'show contact info', 'for more information']
